metadata.title: CVE-2014-2286 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: main/http.c in Asterisk Open Source 1.8.x before 1.8.26.1, 11.8.x before11.8.1, and 12.1.x before 12.1.1, and Certified Asterisk 1.8.x before1.8.15-cert5 and 11.6 before 11.6-cert2, allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (stack consumption) and possibly execute arbitrary codevia an HTTP request with a large number of Cookie headers.

criterions.comment: asterisk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
